lead_paragraph: JAFFE--Joseph M.,of Lenox, MA and Sarasota, FL died peacefully at home on April 5, 2016 in his 89th year. A World War II Veteran, he resided in Brooklyn until his retirement. Joe lived surrounded by those he loved: his wife of 60 years, Phyllis, his children and grandchildren, his sister, Judith, and many lifelong friends. Joe brought to this world and leaves us with a deep sense of ethics, a love of education and knowledge, and a commitment to making the world a better place. A celebration of Joe's life will be held in the Berkshires later this year. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  JAFFE, JOSEPH M.
